history.content:
Newly admitted 5th YR MS students received the e-mail.

Criteria below for the Siebel Scholar Fellowship:

-Nominee ranks in 10% of their EE/CS Division class based on academic results
-Nominee has record of distinguished research
-Nominee demonstrates excellence, and leadership qualities, in the community and in experience prior to graduate program
-Nominee has completed at least a year at the University of California, Berkeley and is expected to have one year remaining in the Master’s program, or be in last year of the undergraduate program in a co-terminus undergraduate and Master’s program. Those that are eligible include incoming 5th yr MS students, MEng students who were Cal undergrads, and second year MS-only students.

Newly admitted 5th YR MS students received the e-mail.

Criteria below for the Siebel Scholar Fellowship:

-Nominee ranks in 10% of their CS Division class based on academic results
-Nominee has record of distinguished research
-Nominee demonstrates excellence, and leadership qualities, in the community and in experience prior to graduate program
-Nominee has completed at least a year at the University of California, Berkeley and is expected to have one year remaining in the Master’s program, or be in last year of the undergraduate program in a co-terminus undergraduate and Master’s program

children.subject: Applicants will be reviewed on whether or not they meet the criteria. Ultimately, Dean Sastry selects the winners of the award.
Just to clarify did all newly admitted 5th year m.s students receive the email or only the subset of them that met the criteria?

The Siebel Scholars Foundation typically reveals their awardees in late-July/early-August. The College of Engineering Dean's Office has already sent out nominees. You can check http://www.siebelscholars.com/ for updates.
When can we expect the Siebel Scholars to be announced?
When awardees are notified, will applicants not selected by the foundation also be notified about the results?

history.content: Would it be possible to release info on the number of students the siebel scholars application email was sent out to?
history.subject: siebel scholars email
